ModMetaData.name: Gloomy Extra - Kitchen
ModMetaData.author: Semo
ModMetaData.description:
Add-on for Gloomy Furniture Requires Gloomy Furniture.
This is a fan-made add-on While I spend a fair amount of time making these sprites, all credits go to the original devs (Gloomylynx and NukaFrog).
Features - Small Butcher table - 2x1 replaces vanilla butcher table. Found in Production - Electric Stove - A new texture for the electric stove. - Sink - Boost production, increases cleanliness of connected worktable and room. (Works with Dubs Bad Hygiene if installed and enabled) - Butcher shelf - Wall mounted. Boost production, increases cleanliness. - Cupboard A - Wall mounted. Boost production, increases cleanliness. (Connection gets blocked by the wall in some spots. Working on a solution) - Cupboard B and C - Boost production, increases cleanliness. Different east/west textures for better connection. It's not perfect but it's something. - Kitchen Floor - A tiled kitchen floor made from blocks or steel. - Corners for Cupboards - Corner pieces to make everything fit nice.
Load order - Gloomy Furniture - Gloomy Vanilla - Dubs Bad Hygiene - Bad Hygiene Lite - Gloomy Extra
